name: Ghost Cagua Screw Kit #KE0088
description: This is a screw kit for your Ghost Cagua.Kit includes: 1 x axle Ø13 x Ø8 x 35.2mm, 1 x bearing cap Ø19.5 x Ø8 x 5.5mm, 1 x bearing cap Ø19.5 x Ø5.5 x 5.7mm, 1 x counter sunk screw M5 x 16 mm, 1 x axle Ø13 x Ø8 x 42.5mm, 1 x counter sunk screw M5 x 22 mm, 1 x bearing cap Ø15.8 x Ø8 x 5.5mm, 1 x bearing cap Ø15.8 x Ø8 x 5.7mm
